dct_title_s: Korea city plans 1:12,500. Masan / prepared under the direction of the Chief of Engineers by the Army Map Service
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by form lines and spot heights in meters. Depths shown in fathoms at nearly lowest low water." Korean names transcribed according to the McCune-Reischer system of transliteration. Japanese forms of Korean names (shown in parentheses) transcribed according to the modified Hepburn (Romaji) System. Three classes of roads or trails, and areas of vegetation and cultivation are shown. Some buildings are named. Includes key to precincts, Index to sources, glossary of Korean, Japanese and English terms, and notes. Military grid. "2-46." AMS 1. Alternate title: Masan, Korea. In upper left margin: "Korea city plans 1:12,500". Polyconic projection. Relief shown by form lines and spot elevation. Depth shown by fathoms. Korean names transcribed according to the McCune-Reischer system of transliteration. Japanese forms of Korean names (shown in parentheses) transcribed accordinf to the modified Hepburn (Romaji) System.
dct_publisher_sm: Washington, D.C. : Army Map Service, U.S. Army, 1946.
